title: Emergency Alert testing ?!
selftext: Saw this today, first one came in English and the second one came in Hindi, should I be worried?
comments: it says testing, why should you be worried?
Coming on my phone and my colleague's too.

It came on my phone too, it's just testing the system to alert all of the citizens in case of an actual emergency. It was just for testing purposes, so don't mind about it. It's actually quite nice that we have such a system.
I got one too. It spooked me lol
it says production, you should be worried.
Am I the only one who didn't get this?
Why am I not getting this shit, MP walo ke sath yahan bhi bhedbhav
